title: Index of Factory Payrolls, Glass for United States
notes:
Source: Bureau Of Labor Statistics; 1919-1930 Data Are From Bls Bulletin No. 610, Pp. 101, 157-158; 1931-1934 Data Are From Bls Mimeographed Release, "Revised Index Numbers Of Factory Employment And Payrolls, " September 1938; 1935-1939 Data Are From Bls Mimeographed Release, May 1940; 1940-1942 Data Are From "Employment And Payrolls" And Monthly Labor Review.

This NBER data series m08131 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08131
